data.description: Easily generate and process stateful forms
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Basically, this thing saves tons of time and effort. It's a layer
    that sits on top of CGI.pm which takes a more abstract approach to
    forms. It has a couple key wins: (a) automatic, 100% correct
    handling of stickiness, independent of the type of field (even
    handles multiple selects), (b) clean default HTML generated, and (c)
    plugin support for both HTML::Template and Template Toolkit. The
    module is already quite widely-used and very stable. Check
    www.formbuilder.org
